frontmatter.title: Devise with Rails
frontmatter.summary: Devise is a flexible authentication solution for Rails based on Warden.

frontmatter.title: Bootstrap modal with Rails
frontmatter.summary: Extends Bootstrap's native modals to provide additional functionality.

frontmatter.title: Paperclip with Rails
frontmatter.summary: Paperclip is intended as an easy file attachment library for Active Record.

frontmatter.title: Ckeditor with Rails
frontmatter.summary: CKEditor is a WYSIWYG text editor designed to simplify web content creation. It brings common word processing features directly to your web pages.

frontmatter.title: Ancestry with Rails
frontmatter.summary: Ancestry is a gem/plugin that allows the records of a Ruby on Rails ActiveRecord model to be organised as a tree structure.

frontmatter.title: sass

frontmatter.title: Sublime Text
frontmatter.summary: Sublime Text is a cross-platform text and source code editor with a Python application programming interface.
